headline: Chase Is Over: ‘Bullitt’ Car Heads to Auction
abstract: The owner of Steve McQueen’s “hero car” figures the price could approach $5 million, or at least far more than the $3,500 his father paid in 1974.
lead_paragraph: Steve McQueen piloted it in the movie “Bullitt,” and for the next 50 years it was mostly a ghost. Now it’s heading to auction, and the speedy dark-green 1968 Ford Mustang fastback is expected to break records when it crosses the block next week at a Mecum event in  Florida.
